overview: Grace offers us hope and teaches us beauty. This is the life that Marie-Louise, Pascale and Annelise have decided to lead. Accepted, fantasized, rejected: they chose to put their hands in the dough, their feet in the earth, and to believe in this peasant way of life. Winter, love, spring. A cycle between childhood and old age. Over three generations and 50 years of evolution, they tell their story and their vision of the peasant soul.
title: Les immortelles
